title: Thrarin, Dwarven Smith (1U27)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 3 • Dwarf
Strength:	4
Vitality:	2
Site:	3
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert Thrarin to allow him to participate in archery fire and skirmishes until the regroup phase.
Lore:	A blacksmith by trade, Thrarin puts down his hammer and takes up his axe to fight when the need arises.
Rarity:	U
